<h1>rsa-pop-quiz</h1>
<h3>Description</h3>
<pre>
Class, take your seats! It's PRIME-time for a quiz...
nc fickle-tempest.picoctf.net 54688
</pre>
<h3>Solution</h3>
<label>Jawab semua soal tentang komputasi RSA</label>

```python3
import requests
import gmpy2

url = "http://factordb.com/api"

def chall1():
    q = 60413
    p = 76753
    print("Chall 1 :",q*p)

def chall2():
    n = 5051846941
    r = requests.get(url, params={"query": str(n)}).json()
    print("Chall 2 :",r['factors'][1][0])

def chall3():
    e = 3
    n = 
    r = requests.get(url, params={"query": str(n)}).json()
    print("Chall 3 :","N" if len(r['factors']) == 1 else "")

def chall4():
    q = 66347
    p = 12611
    print("Chall 4 :",(q-1)*(p-1))

def chall5():
    m = 6357294171489311547190987615544575133581967886499484091352661406414044440475205342882841236357665973431462491355089413710392273380203038793241564304774271529108729717
    e = 3
    n = 
    print("Chall 5 :",pow(m,e,n))

def chall6():
    c = 
    e = 3
    n = 
    ctx = gmpy2.get_context()
    ctx.precision = 1000
    a = gmpy2.mpfr(2)
    b = gmpy2.mpfr(3)
    c = gmpy2.sqrt(a)/b
    try:
        print("Chall 6:",bytes.fromhex(hex(int(root))[2:]).decode("ascii"))
    except:
        print("Chall 6: N")

def chall7():
    q = 
    p = 
    e = 65537
    phi = (q-1)*(p-1)
    d = gmpy2.invert(e,phi)
    print("Chall 7:",d)

def chall8():
    p = 
    c = 
    e = 65537
    n = 
    r = requests.get(url, params={"query": str(n)}).json()
    q = int(r['factors'][1][0])
    phi = (q-1)*(p-1)
    d = gmpy2.invert(e,phi)
    print("Chall 8:",bytes.fromhex(hex(pow(c,d,n))[2:]).decode())
    
chall1()
chall2()
chall3()
chall4()
chall5()
chall6()
chall7()
chall8()
```
